amendment.description: To extend protections against physical assault to air carrier customer service representatives.

action.text: SA 3490 fell when SA 3464 was tabled.

Amendment SA 3490 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1788-1789; text: CR S1788) To extend protections against physical assault to air carrier customer service representatives.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3490 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3464.
